item.title: 美国住宅建筑商信心降至今年最低水平
item.description: 由于接近 7% 的抵押贷款利率限制了潜在购房者的兴趣，并影响了需求前景，6 月份美国住宅建筑商的信心出乎意料地下降到今年以来的最低水平。【原文：US homebuilder sentiment unexpectedly declined in June to the lowest level this year as mortgage rates near 7% limited prospective-buyer interest and weighed on the demand outlook.】

item.title: 据说印度威士忌制造商将为 1.8 亿美元的上市制定条款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度烈酒制造商 Allied Blenders & Distillers Ltd. 确定了首次公开募股的条款，该公司的估值可能达到 800 亿卢比（约合 9.6 亿美元）。【原文：Indian spirits manufacturer Allied Blenders & Distillers Ltd. set the terms for an initial public offering that could value the firm at 80 billion rupees ($960 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特希望家族办公室帮助建立美洲投资体系
item.description: 2020 年之前，沙特阿拉伯在巴西的投资规模非常小，甚至没有出现在中央银行的相关外资流入数据库中。【原文：Before 2020, Saudi Arabian investment in Brazil was so small that it didn’t even appear in the central bank’s database for relevant foreign inflows.】

item.title: 肯尼亚屈从于反税抗议，面临赤字目标风险
item.description: 肯尼亚当局向公众抗议低头，并承诺收回一系列税收提案，从而危及威廉-鲁托总统减少国家预算赤字的计划。【原文：Kenyan authorities bowed to public protests and pledged to walk back a raft of tax proposals, jeopardizing President William Ruto’s plans to reduce the nation’s budget deficit.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长认为黄金和股票是获利之道
item.description: 随着捷克通胀率重返目标，决策者们也在调整进一步放宽货币政策的步伐，捷克央行行长阿莱士-米歇尔（Ales Michl）正在推进他的另一项计划--让央行盈利。【原文：With Czech inflation returning to the target and policymakers calibrating the pace of further monetary easing, Governor Ales Michl is pushing ahead with his other plan — to make the central bank profitable.】

item.title: 宽松政策停滞不前，巴西企业将面临两位数的利率压力
item.description: 大量举借廉价债务的巴西公司正在为新的现实做准备：两位数的利率持续时间比任何人预期的都要长。【原文：Brazilian companies that loaded up on cheap debt are bracing for a new reality: double-digit interest rates for longer than anyone expected.】

item.title: 特拉菲古拉领导的集团为美国支持的洛比托铁路公司订购 275 辆货车
item.description: 包括大宗商品贸易商 Trafigura 在内的一个集团为连接刚果民主共和国铜矿与邻国安哥拉洛比托港的一条重要铁路订购了 275 辆新集装箱车皮。【原文：A group including commodities trader Trafigura has ordered 275 new container wagons for a key railway linking copper mines in Democratic Republic of Congo to Lobito port in neighboring Angola.】

item.title: 首都军营爆炸造成九人死亡，乍得总统下令进行调查
item.description: 乍得总统马哈马特-代比下令对首都一个战略弹药库的爆炸事件进行调查，这次爆炸造成九人死亡，多人受伤。【原文：Chad’s President Mahamat Déby ordered a probe into an explosion at a strategic munition depot in the capital city that killed nine people and injured many others.】

item.title: 捷克中央银行行长称抗击通胀尚未取得胜利
item.description: 阿莱什-米歇尔就任捷克央行行长时，捷克正处于三十年来最严重的生活成本危机之中，他承诺在两年内控制通货膨胀。【原文：When Ales Michl became the governor of the Czech central bank, the country was in the throes of its worst cost of living crisis in three decades and he pledged to bring inflation under control within two years.】

item.title: Codelco 努力阻止铜产量持续下滑
item.description:
这个顶级供应商的产量骤降至几十年来的最低点。其影响远远超出了智利。【原文：

The top supplier has seen production plunge to its lowest in decades. The implications reach far beyond Chile.

】

item.title: 印度计划通过城市月度数据减少就业数据的滞后性
item.description: 印度正计划缩短劳动力统计数据报告的滞后期，以提高经济数据的透明度和可靠性。【原文：India is planning to cut the lag in reporting of its labor statistics as the nation seeks to make its economic data more transparent and reliable.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率自 3 月以来首次降至 7% 以下
item.description: 上周，美国抵押贷款利率自 3 月份以来首次降至 7% 以下，刺激了购房融资申请的连续增长。【原文：US mortgage rates declined below 7% last week for the first time since March, spurring back-to-back increases in financing applications for home purchases.】

item.title: 人民币兑卢布汇率跌至一年多来最低点
item.description: 美国上周宣布对莫斯科交易所及其子公司实施制裁后，俄罗斯卢布对人民币汇率连续第五天走强。【原文：Russia’s ruble strengthened against the Chinese yuan for the fifth day in a row after the US announced sanctions against the Moscow Exchange and its subsidiaries last week.】

item.title: 银行对欧洲央行的不满在杠杆贷款调查中再次爆发
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）正面临银行对其监管方式的新一轮批评，因为该行正在对一种高风险的借贷方式进行取缔。【原文：The European Central Bank is confronting a fresh wave of criticism from banks over how it supervises the industry, amid a clampdown on a risky type of lending.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯取代中国成为新兴市场最大借款国
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯已取代中国，成为新兴市场中发行国际债务最多的国家，打破了中国连续 12 年居首位的局面。【原文：Saudi Arabia has displaced China as the most prolific issuer of international debt among emerging markets, breaking Beijing’s 12-year run at the top.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气价格上涨，基金连续第二周加大投注力度
item.description: 投资基金加大了对欧洲天然气价格上涨的押注，凸显出人们对燃料供应的担忧与日俱增。【原文：Investment funds have stepped up bets that European gas prices will rise, highlighting increasing concerns over fuel supplies.】

item.title: 菲律宾农业部长希望缩短大米关税削减时间
item.description: 菲律宾农业部长弗朗西斯科-刁劳雷尔（Francisco Tiu Laurel）表示，菲律宾是世界上最大的大米买家之一，应最多只削减一年的大米进口关税，而不是削减到 2028 年，以限制对农民的影响。【原文：The Philippines, one of the world’s top rice buyers, should cut tariffs on imports of the grain for only a year at most instead of up to 2028 to limit the impact on farmers, according to Agriculture Secretary Francisco Tiu Laurel.】

item.title: 如果利差进一步扩大，Vanguard 将看到法国债券的机会
item.description: 全球第二大基金管理公司的投资策略主管表示，如果利差继续扩大，那么大选导致的法国债券暴跌将创造一个买入机会。【原文：The election-driven slump in French bonds will create a buying opportunity if spreads continue to widen, according to the head of investment strategy at the world’s second-biggest money manager.】

item.title: 欧洲央行森特诺称若通胀放缓可进一步下调利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）表示，只要通胀继续趋缓，欧洲中央银行就可以进一步放宽货币政策。【原文：The European Central Bank can ease monetary policy further so long as inflation continues to moderate, according to Governing Council member Mario Centeno.】

item.title: 法国扩大利差，一年后损失 8 亿欧元
item.description: 据法国财政部估计，在埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统宣布举行临时立法选举后，法国债务出现抛售，如果较高的借贷价格持续一年，国家将额外损失约 8 亿欧元（约合 8.59 亿美元）。【原文：France’s Finance Ministry estimates the selloff in the country’s debt after President Emmanuel Macron called snap legislative elections would cost the state around an additional €800 million ($859 million) if the higher price of borrowing persisted for a year.】

item.title: 勒庞的政党支持武装乌克兰，称 "没有法国军队
item.description: 玛丽娜-勒庞领导的国民联盟党主席乔丹-巴尔代拉说，他支持向乌克兰提供自卫所需的弹药，但不支持提供可能引发更广泛战争的装备，这使他在法国在冲突中的角色问题上与埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统的立场较为接近。【原文：Jordan Bardella, president of Marine Le Pen’s National Rally party, said he is in favor of providing Ukraine the ammunition it needs to defend itself but not equipment that might trigger a broader war, placing him relatively close to President Emmanuel Macron’s position on France’s role in the conflict.】

item.title: 挪威首次降息可能还有半年时间：决策指南
item.description: 挪威银行可能即将发出信号，表示在经济显示出基本经受住紧缩货币政策考验的情况下，它还远未做好降低借贷成本的准备。【原文：Norges Bank is probably about to signal that it’s nowhere near ready to cut borrowing costs in an economy that shows signs of largely withstanding tightened monetary policy.】

item.title: 巴西央行将因信誉危机停止降息
item.description: 巴西央行可能将暂停长达近一年的降息周期，因为政策制定者面临着全面的信誉危机，并努力抑制进一步超出目标的通胀预期。【原文：Brazil’s central bank will likely pause its nearly yearlong cycle of interest rates cuts as policymakers face a full-blown credibility crisis and struggle to tame inflation expectations that are rising further above target.】

item.title: 现代汽车首次公开募股有望提升印度汽车制造商的估值
item.description: 现代汽车印度有限公司（Hyundai Motor India Ltd.）计划推出印度最大的股票销售计划之一，这可能会进一步提升印度本已炙手可热的汽车制造商的估值。【原文：Hyundai Motor India Ltd.’s plan for one of India’s largest share sales may further boost valuations for the nation’s already-buzzing automakers.】

item.title: 中央电视台报道：中国汽车制造商呼吁对欧洲大型汽车征收 25% 的税款
item.description: 周三的一份报告称，中国汽车制造商已敦促中国政府采取 "最严厉的措施"，包括对欧盟生产的大型发动机汽车征税25%，以回应布鲁塞尔对中国生产的电动汽车征收关税。【原文：Chinese carmakers have urged Beijing to adopt the “most severe measures”, including a tax of 25% on European Union-made cars with large engines, in response to Brussels’ tariffs on electric vehicles made in China, a report said Wednesday.】

item.title: 市场关注法国和意大利遭欧盟赤字指责
item.description: 法国和意大利因巨额赤字而遭到欧盟的斥责，这是双方对抗的第一阶段，将考验欧盟的决心，理论上可能导致数十亿欧元的罚款。【原文：France and Italy were reprimanded by the European Union for running big deficits, the first stage in a confrontation that will test the bloc’s resolve and could in theory prompt billions of euros in fines.】

item.title: 惠誉预计到 2025 年亚洲旅游业将反弹至科维德时期之前的水平
item.description: 据惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）称，亚洲的旅游业有望在明年上半年达到大流行前的水平，理由是货币疲软、政府努力吸引游客，以及中国出境游猛增。【原文：Asia is on course to reach pre-pandemic levels of tourism in the first half of next year, according to Fitch Ratings, citing weaker currencies, government efforts to lure visitors, and a jump in outbound travel from China.】

item.title: 欧洲央行警告：欧元区国家公共财政面临重大风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行警告说，面对人口老龄化、国防开支和气候变化带来的巨大长期财政风险，欧元区成员国必须立即开始削减债务。【原文：Euro-area members must start reducing debt immediately in the face of enormous long-term fiscal risks from ageing populations, defence spending and climate change, the European Central Bank cautioned.】

item.title: 印尼金属出口创一年来最大增幅
item.description: 由于金属和电气产品促进了印尼的贸易，印尼出口增幅为一年来最大，超过了预期的下降幅度。【原文：Indonesia’s exports rose by the most in a year, beating expectations for a decline, as metal and electrical goods bolstered the nation’s trade.】

item.title: 塔塔集团印度航空公司推出高端经济舱以吸引更多乘客
item.description: 印度航空公司（Air India Ltd.）将首次在其窄体飞机上推出高端经济舱，以在行业领先者靛蓝航空（Indigo）计划于今年晚些时候推出新的高端产品之前，巩固其下滑的市场份额。【原文：Air India Ltd. is rolling out a premium economy class for the first time on its narrowbody aircraft, as it seeks to bolster its sagging market share ahead of sector leader Indigo’s plans for a new premium product later this year.】
